abilities.name: Crippled Savior
abilities.effects: When your Attack hits, but before revealing the BP card, lose -1 Trespass to gain a Crit Chance.

abilities.name: Hephaestum Skin
abilities.effects: For the duration of this Godform, you cannot die from Obols. Each time you draw a You died Obol, lose -1 Trespass.

abilities.name: The Messenger
abilities.effects: For the duration of this Godform, double your Titan's Speed value.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.effects: When you Awaken into this Godform, imediately unexhaust all your exhausted Gear. For the duration of this Godform your Gear cards cannot be exhausted.

abilities.name: God of War
abilities.effects: You cannot die by raising your Rage over 9. When you are about to gain Rage above 9, ignore the gain.

abilities.name: Eschatonic Fuse
abilities.effects: When you are about to perform a Power Roll, lose -1 Trespass to gain +1 Power to this roll.

abilities.name: Hunter of Mortals
abilities.effects: When you are about to perform an Attack Roll, you may set aside one non-Crit die from your Attack Dice pool. Treat this die as an automatic hit.

abilities.name: Critical Shot
abilities.effects: ComplicatedAction Lose -1 Trespass to perform an Attack with your Heavenly Bow! Range 3-9, Pushback X, where X is your Total Power during this Attack.

abilities.name: Poisoned Wisdom
abilities.effects: When you Awaken into this Godform, immediately choose either the AI or BP deck. For the duration of this Godform, keep the top card from the chosen deck revealed at all times.

abilities.name: Moirai Favor
abilities.effects: Start of your turn: You amy lose up to -2 Fate.

name: Dionysus
keywords: Roll Out, Bypass, Auto-inspire, Lifeline, Voluntary Knockdown

abilities.name: Drunken Enlightenment
abilities.effects: When you Awaken into this Godform and at the start of each of your turns, roll a d10. 1-3: Your Power die becomes RedPowerDie. You gain +3 Evasion. 4-5: Your Power die becomes BlackPowerDie. You gain +2 Evasion. 6-7: Your Power die becomes 2 RedPowerDie. You gain +1 Evasion. 8-9: Your Power die becomes WhitePowerDie. 10: Your Power die becomes 2 WhitePowerDie. You gain -1 Evasion.

abilities.name: Godly Comforter
abilities.effects: When any Titan is about to die from crossing a Despair, Ambrosia, Bleeding, Midas, or Pain Limit, lose -1 Trespass to ignore that death and discard as many of the corresponding tokens as to have exactly 1 less than the limit.

abilities.name: Unearthly Beauty
abilities.effects: Fate If the Primordial Attack has a singular Target, lose -1 Trespass to change that Target to you.

abilities.name: Irresistible Call
abilities.effects: MovementAction Lose -1 Trespass to make the Primordial move to you via the shortest path. Use the Primordial's Speed.

abilities.name: Fly
abilities.effects: Fate Exhaust Use during voluntary movement to ignore all Terrain tiles during this movement. You cannot end your movement on an Obstacle or Chasm. Fate Exhaust When you are about to perform a Climb test, automatically succeed at that test instead.

abilities.name: Pitiful as the Sun
abilities.effects: You cannot die from any Curse.

abilities.name: Trigger Finger
abilities.effects: CombatAction Lose -1 Trespass to perform an Attack with your Finger! Range 3-10, Fire X, where X is your Total Power during this Attack.

abilities.name: Till Death Do Us
abilities.effects: Choose another Titan. That Titan gains the PriorityTarget Priority Target token (you cannot gain the PriorityTarget token). As long as you are alive, that Titan cannot die from an Obol Draw. Each that Titan is forced to draw an Obol, lose -1 Trespass.

abilities.name: Scorned Mother
abilities.effects: When fighting against The Nietzschean, the Pitiless, Ur-Fleece, Ur-Father, the Nekron, Zalmoksis, Ur-To-Ev, the Veiled Being, or The Watchress, gain +2 Power.

abilities.name: Trench of the Soul
abilities.effects: You cannot die from Ambrosia tokens or losing (discarding or flipping) Oxygen tokens.

abilities.name: Source and Sacrifice
abilities.effects: Oxygen Lose -1 Trespass to perform a Bonus Attack (once per Battle). After that, a random Titan on the Argo dies.
